about_the_game:
Welcome to the post-apocalyptic thrill ride of your life! Drive to Survive is an adrenaline-pumping arcade driving game in which you're racing not just against time but against the end of the world itself. Navigate through the ruins of civilisation, taxiing survivors to safety while evading the relentless undead hordes that now rule the streets.

Key Features:

Survivor Taxi Service: Dive into the heart of a world overrun by the undead. Your mission? Rescue survivors and deliver them to safe zones while managing your fuel, vehicle health, and the clock. Each survivor saved is a step towards rebuilding humanity.

Post-Apocalyptic Open World: Explore a vast, open-world environment devastated by the apocalypse. Each corner holds its own dangers and challenges, from undead-infested alleyways to treacherous, rubble-strewn highways. Discover shortcuts and hidden paths to get your passengers to safety in record time.

High-Impact Gameplay: Get ready for a gameplay experience that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Navigate through hordes of zombies, perform daring rescues, and execute heart-stopping stunts. This is accompanied by a high-energy soundtrack perfectly matching the game's intense atmosphere.

Pumping Soundtrack: Fuel your drive with a dynamic, pulse-pounding soundtrack. Each track is designed to enhance your gameplay experience, driving you to push the limits of speed and survival.

In Drive 2 Survive, every second counts, every decision matters, and every ride could be your last. Are you ready to put your driving skills to the ultimate test and help save what remains of humanity?

Join the ride. Save lives. Drive to survive.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD 2.5 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 12 compatible card
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu
  • Processor: Hex-core Intel or AMD 3.4 GHz or superior
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER or superior
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
